entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
